name: sucker-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
short_effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
